snippet: Ms. May will direct an “American Masters” installment on the acclaimed director, her former comedy partner.
abstract: Elaine May will direct PBS television documentary on her former comic partner, award-winning director Mike Nichols, who died in November 2014; film will air in January 2016 as 30th season opener of network’s American Masters series.
lead_paragraph: Ms. May will direct an “American Masters” installment on the acclaimed director, her former comedy partner.

headline.main: Elaine May to Direct Mike Nichols Documentary for PBS
headline.print_headline: Elaine May to Direct Mike Nichols Documentary
